attributes.title: Border Crossings -- U.S.
attributes.short-description: Border Crossing Ports (NTAD 2015) are points of entry for land modes along the U.S. - Canadian and U.S.- Mexcian borders. The ports of entry are located in 15 states along the U.S. borders. The nominal scale of the data set is 1:1000,000 with a maximal positional error of +- 10 meters.
attributes.subtitle: Border Crossing Ports
